item.title: Mining items
item.dc:creator: @metalfan231 metalfan231
item.description:
@metalfan231 wrote:

Okay, so what I’m trying to do is make it so you can obtain certain items from mining rocks, like you can sometimes obtain gems from mining in Runescape. I’m using a Devolution 7.0 source, so I first tried by copying the code from the chests in Yanille and the Legends Guild, but they just end up giving me one hundred errors. So, if anyone knows what to do, please help me out. Thank you

Note: These are a few codes I’ve tried, and, at the least, most of them are simple, since I suck at coding.

if (roll < 0.5) { addItem (1267, 1); sendMessage("You have recieved an iron pickaxe!"); break;

if (roll < 0.5) { int[] items = { 1267 }; int r = (int) (Math.random() * items.length); sendMessage("You have recieved a "+ getItemName(items[r]) + "!"); addItem(items[r], 1); break;

* GEM ROCK case : case : //Item.randomSGem[0] = 6; mining[1] = 40; * mining[2] = 65; mining[4] = Item.randomSPickaxe(); break;

Read full topic
